Articles.Content:
Hi all.  Been playing KSP since about 0.6... First post here.

Now before anyone says search search search... I have... And I can't find an answer.

i need help finding the locations for the contracts.

in previous versions I had the waypoint manger, as well as mechjeb.

i have both latest updated, and the waypoint manger doesn't seem to work at all.  

Why can't I find the contract sites any longer?  Is something clashing? Or is it inbuilt. I can't seem to find the cause.

i am only at the stage befor #90 tech tree...

 

please help!  I'm running out of gas endlessly searching for a site!

Waypoint Manager should be working fine in the latest version as far as I know.

As far as stock you can select the contract location in map view and "set as target" it will then appear on your Navball as a marker.

While not as nice as the visual marker from Waypoint Manager, it works well enough to get the job done.
